title: Gluten-Free Crumb Crust
directions: In a small bowl, combine all ingredients. Press onto the bottom and up the sides of a 9-in. pie plate coated with cooking spray. Bake at 375Â° for 10-14 minutes or until set. Cool on a wire rack.
Fill as desired. If baking the filling, shield edges of crust with foil to prevent overbrowning. Yield: 1 crust.
